resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water. Often served in a cup. The simplest coffee to make
A tall, milk coffee. A espresso with milk and a little milk foam poured over it. Can be served in a latte glass or a coffee cup.
Chocolate flavored espresso with steamed milk.
Strong black coffee served in small cups.
